title: Chip Roy
deleted: The Democratic Congressional Campaign Committee criticized Roy's invoking the Nazis as "talk-radio hyperbole" by "equating common-sense public health measures" with "The Nazi regime's persecution of Jews [which] was one of man's most evil acts."<ref name=DCCC/> They said his "remarks show heâ€™s unfit for office".<ref name=DCCC>{{cite web|title=Ahead of Passover, Chip Roy Says 'Stay at Home' Measures Akin to 'Nazi Germany'|date=April 7, 2020|website=DCCC|url=https://dccc.org/ahead-passover-chip-roy-says-stay-home-measures-akin-nazi-germany/}}</ref>
